name: Bela Automation
description: UI Automation tool that works in the DevConsole. Ideal for writing e2e front-end tests.
content_security_policy: default-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' http://localhost:* https://localhost:* https://w2ui.com; style-src 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data:; font-src 'self' data:;
